程序包 rainbowsix.ss

类 Corpus

java.lang.Object
rainbowsix.ss.Corpus
public class Corpus extends Object
语料库类.
UC-11 Classify a single text
UC-12 Classify all lines of text in a file for sentiment [includes accuracy evaluations]
UC-13 Classify texts in a column within a file or folder
UC-21 Classify positive (1 to 5) and negative (-1 to -5) sentiment strength separately
UC-22 Use trinary classification (positive-negative-neutral)
UC-23 Use binary classification (positive-negative)
UC-24 Use a single positive-negative scale classification
UC-27 Optimise sentiment strengths of existing sentiment terms
UC-29 Machine learning evaluations
作者:
注释编写 徐晨 朱甲豪

    void
    optimiseDictionaryWeightingsForCorpusScale(int iMinImprovement)
    根据scale方法的性能变化进行字典权重优化.
    根据scale方法的结果(以差值大小表示)是否达到了规定的最小提升,来对现存的字典进行权重优化,如果不满足优化要求则不保存权重更改.
    void
    optimiseDictionaryWeightingsForCorpusTrinaryOrBinary(int iMinImprovement)
    根据三元分类法或二元分类法性能变化进行字典权重优化.

  • 方法详细资料

    • indexClassifiedCorpus

      public void indexClassifiedCorpus()
      给语料库建立分类索引.
      根据options中的选项, 选择建立对应类型的术语分类器索引, 然后将所有段落也按照对应的类型添加到索引中.
      UC-21 Classify positive (1 to 5) and negative (-1 to -5) sentiment strength separately
      UC-22 Use trinary classification (positive-negative-neutral)
      UC-23 Use binary classification (positive-negative)
      UC-24 Use a single positive-negative scale classification

    • printCorpusUnusedTermsClassificationIndex

      public void printCorpusUnusedTermsClassificationIndex(String saveFile, int iMinFreq)
      打印语料库未使用的术语分类索引.
      确保语料库已经进行过分类、且已经完成索引的初始化后，根据选项的不同模式，分别将对应的分类索引按照一定的频率筛选后打印到指定的输出文件中.
      UC-21 Classify positive (1 to 5) and negative (-1 to -5) sentiment strength separately
      UC-22 Use trinary classification (positive-negative-neutral)
      UC-23 Use binary classification (positive-negative)
      UC-24 Use a single positive-negative scale classification
      参数:
      saveFile - 保存文本路径
      iMinFreq - 最小频率

    • setSubcorpus

      public void setSubcorpus(boolean[] bSubcorpusMember)
      设置子语料库.
      根据子语料库成员更改全局子语料库成员数组、子语料库成员数量.
      参数:
      bSubcorpusMember - 是否是子语料库成员的boolean数组

    • useWholeCorpusNotSubcorpus

      public void useWholeCorpusNotSubcorpus()
      采用整个语料库而不是子语料库.

    • getCorpusSize

      public int getCorpusSize()
      获取语料库量级.
      返回:
      语料库段落数

    • setSingleTextAsCorpus

      public boolean setSingleTextAsCorpus(String sText, int iPosCorrect, int iNegCorrect)
      设置单文本文件作为语料库.
      UC-11 Classify a single text
      参数:
      sText - 文本
      iPosCorrect - 积极实际值
      iNegCorrect - 消极实际值
      返回:
      是否设置成功

    • setCorpus

      public boolean setCorpus(String sInFilenameAndPath)

      参数:

      返回:
      是否设置成功

    • reClassifyClassifiedCorpusForSentimentChange

      public void reClassifyClassifiedCorpusForSentimentChange(int iSentimentWordID, int iMinParasToContainWord)
      对出现情绪变化的已经分类的语料库进行重分类.
      UC-21 Classify positive (1 to 5) and negative (-1 to -5) sentiment strength separately
      UC-22 Use trinary classification (positive-negative-neutral)
      UC-23 Use binary classification (positive-negative)
      UC-24 Use a single positive-negative scale classification
      参数:
      iSentimentWordID - 情绪词ID
      iMinParasToContainWord - 容纳单词的最小段落数

      返回:
      是否打印成功

      根据输入的参数多次运行十折的交叉验证, 并将结果输出到指定文件中.
      UC-29 Machine learning evaluations
      参数:
      iMinImprovement - 最小提升
      bUseTotalDifference - 是否要将差异累加
      iReplications - 重复次数
      iMultiOptimisations - 权重优化的总次数
      sOutFileName - 输出的文件路径

    • classifyAllLinesAndRecordWithID

      public void classifyAllLinesAndRecordWithID(String sInputFile, int iTextCol, int iIDCol, String sOutputFile)

      UC-13 Classify texts in a column within a file or folder

      UC-23 Use binary classification (positive-negative)

    • run10FoldCrossValidationForAllOptionVariations

      public void run10FoldCrossValidationForAllOptionVariations(int iMinImprovement, boolean bUseTotalDifference, int iReplications, int iMultiOptimisations, String sOutFileName)
      使用所有的可能的不同选项进行十折的交叉验证.
      根据options中的相关属性, 分别决定是否要使用三元分类法, scale分类法, 二元分类法 , 以及习语, 重复强调, 增强词等多种影响情绪得分的因素 , 进行十折的交叉验证, 并把结果保存在指定文件中.
      UC-21 Classify positive (1 to 5) and negative (-1 to -5) sentiment strength separately
      UC-22 Use trinary classification (positive-negative-neutral)
      UC-23 Use binary classification (positive-negative)
      UC-24 Use a single positive-negative scale classification
      UC-29 Machine learning evaluations
      参数:
      iMinImprovement - 最小提升
      bUseTotalDifference - 是否要累加所有差异
      iReplications - 重复次数
      iMultiOptimisations - 权重优化次数
      sOutFileName - 输出文件路径

    • optimiseDictionaryWeightingsForCorpusScale

      public void optimiseDictionaryWeightingsForCorpusScale(int iMinImprovement)
      根据scale方法的性能变化进行字典权重优化.
      根据scale方法的结果(以差值大小表示)是否达到了规定的最小提升,来对现存的字典进行权重优化,如果不满足优化要求则不保存权重更改.
      UC-27 Optimise sentiment strengths of existing sentiment terms
      UC-24 Use a single positive-negative scale classification
      参数:
      iMinImprovement - 最小提升

    • optimiseDictionaryWeightingsForCorpusTrinaryOrBinary

      UC-22 Use trinary classification (positive-negative-neutral)
      UC-23 Use binary classification (positive-negative)
      UC-27 Optimise sentiment strengths of existing sentiment terms
      参数:
      iMinImprovement - 最小提升

    • SummariseMultiple10FoldValidations

      public void SummariseMultiple10FoldValidations(String sInputFile, String sOutputFile)
      总结十折交叉验证的结果. 从输入文件中读取十折交叉验证的结果, 通过对比实际结果和预测结果后将对比结果写入输出文件中.
      UC-29 Machine learning evaluations
      参数:
      sInputFile - 输入文件
      sOutputFile - 输出文件
